section.title: AudioHardware::Info Struct Reference

listitem.para: std::pair< unsigned int, unsigned int > sample_rate_range

section.title: Detailed Description

note.title: Note
note.para: This structure encapsulates the information about audio hardware devices and their supported features.

formalpara.title: See also
formalpara.para: std::pair<std::string, std::string> card_info - audio card index and audio mixer index, coupled.
sample_rate_range - supportedRates for the list of supported sample rates.
numberOfChannels - the number of output audio device channels
